net.canarymod.tasks

Class ServerTaskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.tasks.ServerTaskManager

  • public final class ServerTaskManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Server Task Manager

    The Manager for ServerTask
    If an exception occurs while running a task, it gets removed from the queue, regardless of continuous status

    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        public static boolean addTask(ServerTask task)
        Adds a ServerTask to the queue
        Parameters:
        task - the ServerTask to be added
        Returns:
        true if successfully added; false if not

      • removeTask

        public static boolean removeTask(ServerTask task)
        Removes a ServerTask from the queue
        When a Plugin is disabled, it should remove it's tasks from the queue
        Parameters:
        task - the ServerTask to be removed
        Returns:
        true if removed; false if not found or unable to be removed

      • removeTasks

        public static void removeTasks(TaskOwner owner)
        Removes all the tasks for a specified TaskOwner
        Parameters:
        owner - the TaskOwner to remove tasks for

      • isQueued

        public static boolean isQueued(ServerTask task)
        Finds out if the given task is queued.
        Parameters:
        task - what ServerTask to check
        Returns:
        true if the given task is queued; false otherwise

      • getServerTasksForTaskOwner

        public static java.util.List<ServerTask> getServerTasksForTaskOwner(TaskOwner owner)
        Gets a List of ServerTasks that are in queue with the given owner
        Parameters:
        owner - The TaskOwner to look for ServerTasks with
        Returns:
        will return an empty ArrayList if no ServerTasks are found

      • runTasks

        public static void runTasks()
        Internal method called to run the tasks or decrease timers.
